languages.text: "Не знаю, почему перечисление железяк наполняет тебя такой болью, но продолжай... я готов быть внимательным слушателем".

traits.locale_text: "Не знаю, почему перечисление железяк наполняет тебя такой болью, но продолжай... я готов быть внимательным слушателем".

languages.text: "I cannot fathom why droning on about lumps of metal fills you with such pain, but do go on... I am all ears."
languages.original_text: "Не знаю, почему перечисление железяк наполняет тебя такой болью, но продолжай... я готов быть внимательным слушателем".

traits.locale_text: "I cannot fathom why rattling about slabs of metal fills you with such pain, but do go on... I am all ears."
"I cannot fathom why rattling about slabs of metal fills you with such pain, but do go on... I am all ears."
"I cannot fathom why droning on about lumps of metal fills you with such pain, but do go on... I am all ears."
"I cannot fathom why droning on about lumps of metal fills you with such pain, but do go on... I am all ears."
"I cannot fathom why droning on about lumps of metal fills you with such pain, but do go on... I am all ears."
"I cannot fathom why droning on about lumps of metal fills you with such pain, but do go on... I am all ears."

languages.text: 「金属の塊について延々と語ることが、なぜそんなにお前を苦しめるのか理解できないが、続けていいぞ。聞いてやるから」
languages.original_text: "I cannot fathom why droning on about lumps of metal fills you with such pain, but do go on... I am all ears."

traits.locale_text: 「金属の塊について延々と語ることが、なぜそんなにお前を苦しめるのか理解できないが、続けていいぞ。聞いてやるから」

languages.text: "Mir ist schleierhaft, warum es Euch mit solchem Schmerz erfüllt, über Klumpen von Metall zu schwadronieren, aber nur zu, fahrt fort ... Ich bin ganz Ohr."
languages.original_text: "I cannot fathom why droning on about lumps of metal fills you with such pain, but do go on... I am all ears."

traits.locale_text: "Mir ist schleierhaft, warum es Euch mit solchem Schmerz erfüllt, über Klumpen von Metall zu schwadronieren, aber nur zu, fahrt fort ... Ich bin ganz Ohr."

languages.text: « J'ai toutes les peines du monde à comprendre pourquoi vous ressentez tant de chagrin en évoquant des amas de métal, mais continuez donc... Je suis tout ouïe. »
languages.original_text: "I cannot fathom why droning on about lumps of metal fills you with such pain, but do go on... I am all ears."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai toutes les peines du monde à comprendre pourquoi vous ressentez tant de chagrin en évoquant des amas de métal, mais continuez donc... Je suis tout ouïe. »

languages.text: «No me explico por qué te causa tanto dolor farfullar sobre trastos de metal, pero continúa... soy todo oídos».
languages.original_text: "I cannot fathom why droning on about lumps of metal fills you with such pain, but do go on... I am all ears."

traits.locale_text: «No me explico por qué te causa tanto dolor farfullar sobre trastos de metal, pero continúa... soy todo oídos».

languages.text: “我无法理解，喋喋不休地谈论这些金属块，怎么会让你如此痛苦？不过，请你继续说下去吧……我洗耳恭听。”
languages.original_text: "I cannot fathom why droning on about lumps of metal fills you with such pain, but do go on... I am all ears."

traits.locale_text: “我无法理解，喋喋不休地谈论这些金属块，怎么会让你如此痛苦？不过，请你继续说下去吧……我洗耳恭听。”

languages.text: "Metal yığınlarından bahsederken bu kadar kahrolmanı anlayamıyorum ama devam et, kulağım sende."
languages.original_text: "I cannot fathom why droning on about lumps of metal fills you with such pain, but do go on... I am all ears."

traits.locale_text: "Metal yığınlarından bahsederken bu kadar kahrolmanı anlayamıyorum ama devam et, kulağım sende."

languages.original_text: "I cannot fathom why droning on about lumps of metal fills you with such pain, but do go on... I am all ears."
